title: AFK
body: I love playing league of legend and i never try to get afk but sometimes my computer shuting down  and when i always open back it says you have 5 match afk so Can you guys get afk little bit down because 20 min too long and i really getting bored and thats why i am playing this game it is awesome game but 20 min too long so plz help about this....

replies.body: I agree!  I rarely have ever been afk but this time all of a sudden there is a 20 min wait?  Kinda a joke

We're unable to modify or remove these penalties. Regardless of your intent, being absent from a match negatively impacts everyone in it.

I strongly recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to work through common solutions for the random shutdowns you're experiencing. If you encounter further issues with these shutdowns, let me know.
